Function reference

Description

oxcgrt-package oxcgrt
An Interface to the Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker API

Retrieve

get_json_time() get_json_actions()
Get JSON for OxCGRT data
get_data()
Get policy actions and stringency data from JSON
get_data_time()
Get time series stringency index data from JSON
get_data_action() get_data_actions()
Get policy actions data from JSON

Calculate

calculate_subindex() calculate_subindices()
Calculate OxCGRT sub-index score for a single indicator
calculate_index() calculate_gov_response() calculate_containment_health() calculate_stringency() calculate_economic_support() calculate_indices()
Calculate an OxCGRT index or indices

Datasets

codebook
Codebook for the Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker
indicatorData
Example indicator data for sub-index calculations
